thread.title: A more than correct address in a great location
thread.title_full: A more than correct address in a great location - Review of Golden Tulip Hotel Washington Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Christine F
title: A more than correct address in a great location
text: 100 metres from the Pyrmaides metro station, 300 metres from the Louvre, 200 metres from the shops of the Rue Saint Honoré, 300 metres from the buzzing Saint Honoré Marché, 500 metres from the Opera and set in a great restaurant area, what more could you want? A clean, friendly and comfortable hotel? Well this is what you have here. Comfortable beds, good wifi, large bathrooms, very pleasant decor, UK tv channels, good wifi, welcoming reception & breakfast staff. Don't look further.
